title: Walmart leverages AI to enhance supply chain efficiency and reduce costs

title: There’s no such thing as a ‘good’ bubble
description: Tech titans like Jeff Bezos argue the long-term benefits to society from artificial intelligence outweigh the losses investors may suffer from the current craze. Yet painful busts can do long-term damage. And the latest boom is more speculative than previous technology manias.
content: LONDON, Oct 10 (Reuters Breakingviews) - Even the tech titans admit we are in a bubble. There will be plenty of losses to go round, they say, but the massive investment in artificial intelligence will leave everyone better off. In short, what we’re s... [5621 chars]

title: Here’s the other mega trade that will reshape your portfolio
description: While artificial intelligence remains the dominant driver of markets, “debasement” has become the talk of the global financial system this week.
content:
We’re pretty sure that “batshit crazy” isn’t a technical term in financial markets, but it’s hard to disagree with the assessment of recent moves in precious metals by Societe Generale strategist, Albert Edwards.

title: SoftBank Group to acquire Swiss firm's robotics division for $5.38 bil
description: SoftBank Group Corp said Wednesday it will acquire the robotics business of Swiss industrial automation company ABB Ltd. for $5.38 billion by 2026 to beef up its robotics business utilizing artificial intelligence technology. SoftBank Group generally focuses its investments on AI-centered industries from the semiconductor, robotics, data centers and energy…

title: AI v Hollywood: One battle after another to save the human performance

title: Top Democrat demands Medicare insurers disclose uses of AI in care
description: A key Democrat is asking top Medicare Advantage insurers about how they use artificial intelligence in decisions about medical care and coverage.
